en.pageTitle: SuizaF√°cil ‚Äì Your new life in Switzerland, step by step
en.pageDescription: SuizaF√°cil: Your new life in Switzerland, step by step. Guides, tools and advice for Spanish speakers who want to live and work in Switzerland.
en.logo_text_sub: Your new life in Switzerland, step by step.
en.hero_badge_text: Guide for Spanish speakers in Switzerland
en.hero_title: The easiest way to start your life in Switzerland.
en.hero_subtitle: Clear information, smart tools and personal guidance so you don't get lost in the maze of procedures, insurance and housing.
en.hero_slogan: Your new life in Switzerland, step by step.
en.hero_meta: Guides in Spanish ¬∑ Based on 17 years of real experience in Switzerland ¬∑ Made for you
en.hero_card_1: Complete arrival checklist: registration, health insurance, bank account and more.
en.hero_card_2: Calculate your net salary and understand your deductions before accepting an offer.
en.hero_card_3: Email templates and documents for finding an apartment, job and handling procedures.
en.hero_tagline: All explained in Spanish, with real examples and without unnecessary jargon.
en.hero_advisory_desc: Want us to review your situation together? Book a personalized session.
en.problem_title: Moving to Switzerland is an opportunity‚Ä¶ but also a maze.
en.problem_subtitle: Procedures in German, systems you don't know, different rules in each canton. The information exists, but it's scattered, incomplete, or only in German/French.
en.problem_card_1_text: Forms, deadlines, permits, registrations‚Ä¶ and almost everything in German or French. One mistake can cost you time and money.
en.problem_card_2_text: The Swiss system is very different from the Spanish one. It's easy to overpay or choose options that don't suit you.
en.problem_card_3_text: Competitive markets, strict requirements and different cultural expectations. Without guidance, it's easy to get frustrated.
en.solution_title: SuizaF√°cil: everything you need, in one place.
en.solution_subtitle: A platform specifically designed for Spanish speakers who want to live and work in
: clear information, practical tools and real guidance.
en.solution_card_1_text: From day one to your first tax return. Explained in Spanish, with examples and downloadable checklists.
en.solution_card_2_text: Calculators, comparisons and document generators so you make decisions with data, not guesses.
en.solution_card_3_text: 1:1 advice, document review and help with forms. You're not
en.features_subtitle: We start with the essentials for your arrival and first months in Switzerland. Gradually, we add more tools and content based on community needs.
en.features_guide_2: How to choose your health insurance
en.features_guide_4: Finding an apartment and preparing your application
en.features_guide_5: First steps in the Swiss tax system
en.features_tool_3: Email templates for housing and work
en.features_tool_4: Coming soon: insurance comparison and tax simulator
en.features_service_2: Review of contracts and documents (where legally possible)
en.features_service_4: Coaching to adapt your CV and profile to Switzerland
en.pricing_title: Start free. Pay only if you need more support.
en.pricing_subtitle: SuizaF√°cil's goal is for you to make good decisions from the start. That's why the base is free and premium services are clear and transparent.
en.pricing_premium_note: For those who want to go further.
en.pricing_advisory_note: For specific cases and personal support.
en.founder_subtitle: Economist, software developer and living in Switzerland for 17 years. I know this country from the
: as a foreigner, as a professional and as a family man.
en.founder_text_1: I've seen many Spanish speakers arrive with hope‚Ä¶ and lose time, money and energy due to lack of clear information and support.
en.founder_text_2: That's why I created SuizaF√°cil: so you have in one place what took me years to learn. My goal is for you to make informed decisions, fearlessly and without unpleasant surprises.
en.founder_text_3: I speak Spanish, German and English. I can be your bridge between what you know and what awaits you in Switzerland.
en.newsletter_sub: Get free guides, platform updates and priority access to the community when we launch.
en.newsletter_alert: Thank you for your interest in SuizaF√°cil! We'll save your email to let you know when we launch the platform.
